title: Albania Discovery Week - 6 Days Complete Tour
short_description: Experience the best of Albania in 6 unforgettable days - from Tirana's history to the Albanian Riviera's stunning beaches.
long_description: Join us for the ultimate Albanian adventure! This comprehensive 6-day tour takes you from the bustling capital of Tirana through ancient cities, UNESCO World Heritage sites, pristine beaches, and dramatic mountain landscapes. Experience Albania's rich history, vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality while staying in carefully selected accommodations. Perfect for first-time visitors who want to see the best of what Albania has to offer.
highlights: Tirana city tour including Skanderbeg Square and Bunk'Art museums
UNESCO World Heritage site of Berat - 'City of a Thousand Windows'
Gjirokaster Castle and Ottoman bazaar exploration
Butrint National Park - UNESCO World Heritage archaeological site
Blue Eye natural spring - crystal clear turquoise waters
Albanian Riviera beaches in Saranda and Ksamil
Professional guide throughout the entire journey
included: 5 nights accommodation in 3-star hotels with breakfast
Professional English-speaking guide for entire tour
All transportation in comfortable air-conditioned vehicle
All entrance fees to museums and archaeological sites
meeting_point_details: Pick up from Tirana International Airport (Mother Teresa Airport) or central Tirana hotels. Detailed meeting instructions will be provided upon booking confirmation.

title: Classic Albania - 6 Days Cultural Journey
short_description: The perfect introduction to Albania - from Tirana's vibrant culture to UNESCO heritage sites and the stunning Albanian Riviera.
long_description: Discover the essence of Albania on this carefully crafted 6-day journey. Starting in dynamic Tirana, you'll explore medieval Berat's Ottoman architecture, wander through Gjirokastër's stone streets, and relax on the pristine beaches of Saranda. This tour combines Albania's rich cultural heritage with its natural beauty, including visits to UNESCO World Heritage sites and the famous Blue Eye spring.
highlights: Tirana city highlights: Skanderbeg Square, Et'hem Bey Mosque, Blloku neighborhood
Krujë Castle and Skanderbeg Museum or Dajti Mountain cable car
Berat UNESCO Castle and Onufri Museum
Traditional Ottoman houses and Mangalem quarter
Old bazaar shopping and traditional crafts
Ksamil beaches and island boat trips
included: All entrance fees and museum tickets
Blue Eye and Butrint entry fees
meeting_point_details: Airport pickup from Tirana International Airport or meet at centrally located Tirana hotel lobby. Detailed instructions provided upon booking.

title: Albanian Riviera Highlights - 5 Days Beach & Culture
short_description: Explore Albania's stunning coastline from Vlorë to Saranda, including pristine beaches, dramatic mountain passes, and ancient archaeological sites.
long_description: Discover the untouched beauty of the Albanian Riviera on this 5-day coastal adventure. Drive through the spectacular Llogara Pass, relax on hidden beaches, explore Porto Palermo's historic castle, and visit the ancient ruins of Butrint. This tour perfectly balances beach relaxation with cultural exploration, showcasing Albania's Mediterranean charm and rich history.
highlights: Llogara National Park scenic mountain drive
Porto Palermo and Ali Pasha Castle
included: Boat trips to beaches and islands
Butrint National Park entry and guide
meeting_point_details: Meet in Vlorë city center or transfer available from Tirana (additional cost). Beach hotels pickup included.

title: Southern Cultural Loop - 6 Days Archaeological Journey
short_description: Immerse yourself in Albania's ancient history visiting Apollonia, Berat, Gjirokastër, and Butrint - four UNESCO and archaeological treasures.
long_description: Perfect for history enthusiasts, this 6-day cultural journey takes you through Albania's most significant archaeological and UNESCO World Heritage sites. From the ancient Greek ruins of Apollonia to the Ottoman architecture of Berat and Gjirokastër, ending with the spectacular Butrint archaeological park. Experience Albania's layered history from Illyrian times to the Ottoman period.
highlights: Tirana orientation and National History Museum
Apollonia archaeological site with ancient Greek theater
Berat Castle and Onufri Museum masterpieces
Traditional house visits and handicraft workshops
Local family visits and cultural exchanges
Butrint National Park full guided tour
included: All meals including traditional Albanian cuisine
All site entrance fees and museum tickets
Cultural workshops and local family visits
meeting_point_details: Tirana city center hotel pickup or meet at National History Museum main entrance.

title: Northern Mountains & Theth - 6 Days Alpine Adventure
short_description: Explore Albania's dramatic northern Alps, traditional mountain villages, and pristine wilderness in Theth and Valbona valleys.
long_description: Venture into Albania's spectacular northern mountains on this 6-day adventure through pristine alpine landscapes. Discover the traditional stone villages of Theth and Valbona, hike to stunning waterfalls, learn about the ancient Kanun code of honor, and experience authentic mountain hospitality. This tour is perfect for nature lovers seeking authentic cultural immersion away from the crowds.
highlights: Shkodër city tour and Rozafa Castle
Traditional mountain road journey to Theth
Theth Church and Lock-in Tower cultural sites
included: All meals featuring traditional mountain cuisine
All hiking equipment and safety gear
meeting_point_details: Transfer from Tirana to Shkodër included. Mountain roads require 4x4 vehicles - weather dependent routes.

title: Tirana Historical Walking Tour
short_description: Discover the heart of Albania's capital with our comprehensive walking tour through Tirana's most iconic landmarks.
long_description: Join us for an unforgettable journey through Tirana's rich history and vibrant culture. This tour takes you through the city's most significant sites, from the Ottoman era to communist times and modern developments. You'll learn about Albania's fascinating past while experiencing the dynamic energy of this emerging European capital.
highlights: Skanderbeg Square - the heart of Tirana
National History Museum - Albania's largest museum
Bunk'Art 1 - Cold War bunker turned museum
Blloku neighborhood - former communist elite area
meeting_point_details: Meet at the Skanderbeg Monument in the center of Skanderbeg Square. Look for the guide with a red umbrella.

title: Dajti Mountain & Cable Car Experience
short_description: Take the cable car up Dajti Mountain for breathtaking views of Tirana and the Albanian coastline.
long_description: Experience Albania's natural beauty with a trip to Dajti Mountain National Park. Take the modern cable car system up to 1,000 meters above sea level for spectacular panoramic views. Enjoy hiking trails, traditional Albanian cuisine at mountain restaurants, and fresh mountain air just minutes from downtown Tirana.
highlights: Cable car ride with panoramic views
meeting_point_details: Meet at the Dajti Ekspres Cable Car Station entrance. Transportation from city center can be arranged.

title: Tirana Food & Culture Experience
short_description: Taste authentic Albanian cuisine while exploring local markets, traditional restaurants, and cultural sites.
long_description: Immerse yourself in Albanian culinary traditions with this comprehensive food and culture tour. Visit local markets, taste traditional dishes, learn about Albanian coffee culture, and discover how cuisine reflects the country's diverse cultural influences from Ottoman, Italian, and Balkan traditions.
meeting_point_details: Meet at the main entrance of New Bazaar (Pazari i Ri) near the fountain. Look for the guide with a green apron.
